title: End of Season Rewards
body:
As a reformed player, I am wondering if being "dishonorable" will take away all of the rewards in the end of the season. So will it? 

Thanks @Canadian Pizza

replies.body:
It doesn't look like we've officially said anything about Honor *disqualifying* you from your End of Season rewards. The Honor FAQ does state "youâ€™ll unlock even more rewards at the end of the season", so at this point, it looks like you'll be eligible for extra rewards depending on your Honor Level. 

With that being said, Honor is still a relatively new system of course. There's still a chance for End of Season Ranked Rewards to be rewarded based on your Honor Rank.
